title: Equitable relief
context: [ยง15D-17] Equitable relief. A court may issue an injunction or grant other equitable relief appropriate to ensure substantial compliance with or enforce this chapter on application by: (1) A covered voter alleging a grievance under this chapter; or (2) The attorney general of the State. No award of attorney fees or costs shall be permitted in any private cause of action initiated under this chapter. [L 2012, c 226, pt of ยง1]
